meta.title: Bonobo Bar & More - All Day Beachfront Bar & Café in Rethymno, Crete
meta.description: Experience Bonobo Bar & More - Rethymno's premier beachfront destination for artisan coffee, craft cocktails, and Mediterranean cuisine. Open daily 9am-3am with stunning sea views.

hero.title: Bonobo Bar & More
hero.subtitle: All day beachfront experience in the heart of Rethymno
hero.description: From morning coffee to late-night cocktails, discover our premium selection with stunning Mediterranean views

coffee.title: Coffee & Breakfast
coffee.subtitle: Start your day with artisan coffee and fresh Mediterranean flavors
coffee.description: Begin your morning with our carefully curated coffee selection and fresh breakfast offerings, all enjoyed with panoramic sea views.

feature1.title: Artisan Coffee
feature1.description: Premium espresso blends and specialty brewing methods for the perfect cup

feature2.title: Fresh Breakfast
feature2.description: Mediterranean breakfast options with local ingredients and house-made specialties

feature3.title: Sea View Dining
feature3.description: Enjoy your morning meal with panoramic views of the Mediterranean

drinks.title: Beer, Wine & Spirits
drinks.subtitle: Curated selection of local and international beverages
drinks.description: Discover our extensive collection of craft beers, premium wines, and top-shelf spirits, carefully selected to complement your dining experience.

feature1.title: Craft Beers
feature1.description: Local Greek breweries and international craft selections

feature2.title: Cretan Wines
feature2.description: Exceptional local varietals and Mediterranean wine pairings

feature3.title: Premium Spirits
feature3.description: Top-shelf spirits and traditional Greek liqueurs

events.title: Cocktails & Night Events
events.subtitle: Signature cocktails and vibrant nightlife experiences
events.description: As the sun sets, transform your evening with our handcrafted cocktails and live entertainment in the perfect beachfront atmosphere.

feature1.title: Signature Cocktails
feature1.description: Handcrafted cocktails with local ingredients and creative presentations

feature2.title: Live Music
feature2.description: Regular live performances and DJ sets creating the perfect atmosphere

feature3.title: Special Events
feature3.description: Themed nights, celebrations, and exclusive beachfront parties

contact.title: Visit Us
contact.subtitle: Find us on Rethymno's beautiful beachfront promenade
contact.description: Located in the heart of Rethymno's historic Old Town, we're easily accessible and perfectly positioned for your perfect day or evening out.

footer.description: Rethymno's premier beachfront destination for exceptional experiences from dawn to dusk.
footer.copyright: © 2025 Bonobo Bar & More. All rights reserved.

cookie.message: We use cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to visit this site you agree to our use of cookies.

settings.title: Cookie Settings
settings.description: Choose which cookies you want to allow. You can change these settings at any time.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Full Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Sorry, there was a problem sending your message. Please try again.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for events and special offers.

reservation.title: Make a Reservation
reservation.description: Reserve your table for the perfect dining experience.
reservation.name: Name
reservation.success: Reservation request submitted! We'll confirm availability soon.
reservation.error: Reservation request failed. Please call us directly.
